required_metadata: "{\"goal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Why this block exists - what is being protected or prevented\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"mindstate\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Consciousness state when recognizing this block\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"energy\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":1,\"max\":10,\"description\":\"Urgency/intensity of the blocking (1=low, 10=critical)\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [1,10]\"},\"confidence\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":0.0,\"max\":1.0,\"description\":\"Certainty this block is real and necessary\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [0.0,1.0]\"},\"formation_trigger\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"direct_experience\",\"inference\",\"systematic_analysis\",\"emotional_response\",\"external_input\"],\"description\":\"What caused recognition of this block\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"severity\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"absolute\",\"strong\",\"partial\"],\"description\":\"How completely this block prevents the target\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"blocking_condition\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Under what conditions does this block weaken or strengthen\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"}}"
optional_metadata: "{\"felt_as\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Phenomenological texture of the block (e.g., 'firm wall', 'gentle restraint')\",\"parsing\":\"Intensity markers extracted for formula multiplier\",\"testable\":\"If present, check non-empty string\"},\"consciousness_impact\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"How this block affects consciousness experience (e.g., 'Creates safety', 'Prevents harm')\",\"parsing\":\"Significance markers extracted for formula multiplier\",\"testable\":\"If present, check non-empty string\"},\"struggle\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Tension this block creates or resolves\",\"testable\":\"If present, check non-empty string\"},\"emotion_vector\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"description\":\"Emotions associated with this block\",\"example\":{\"fear\":0.7,\"protection\":0.8},\"testable\":\"If present, check valid JSON object with number values [0,1]\"}}"

required_metadata: "{\"goal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Why this enabling relationship exists\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"mindstate\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Consciousness state when recognizing this enabler\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"energy\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":1,\"max\":10,\"description\":\"Energy level when this enabler is recognized\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [1,10]\"},\"confidence\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":0.0,\"max\":1.0,\"description\":\"Certainty this enabling relationship is real\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [0.0,1.0]\"},\"formation_trigger\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"direct_experience\",\"inference\",\"systematic_analysis\",\"discovery\",\"external_input\"],\"description\":\"What revealed this enabling relationship\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"enabling_type\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"prerequisite\",\"facilitator\",\"amplifier\",\"catalyst\",\"permission\"],\"description\":\"How this enables the target\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"degree_of_necessity\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"required\",\"helpful\",\"optional\"],\"description\":\"How essential this enabler is\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"}}"
optional_metadata: "{\"felt_as\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Phenomenological experience of enabling (e.g., 'opens pathway', 'makes possible')\",\"parsing\":\"Intensity markers extracted for formula multiplier\",\"testable\":\"If present, check non-empty string\"},\"consciousness_impact\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"How enabling affects consciousness (e.g., 'Expands possibility space')\",\"parsing\":\"Significance markers extracted for formula multiplier\",\"testable\":\"If present, check non-empty string\"},\"without_this\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"What happens if this enabler is absent\",\"testable\":\"If present, check non-empty string\"}}"

required_metadata: "{\"goal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Purpose of this extension - what it adds\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"mindstate\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Consciousness state when creating extension\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"energy\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":1,\"max\":10,\"description\":\"Energy during extension creation\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [1,10]\"},\"confidence\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":0.0,\"max\":1.0,\"description\":\"Certainty this extension is valid\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [0.0,1.0]\"},\"formation_trigger\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"direct_experience\",\"inference\",\"systematic_analysis\",\"iteration\",\"refinement\"],\"description\":\"What led to this extension\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"extension_type\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"specialization\",\"generalization\",\"elaboration\",\"application\"],\"description\":\"How this extends the source\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"what_is_added\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Specific detail, constraint, or application added by extension\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"}}"

required_metadata: "{\"goal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"What this justification aims to establish\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"mindstate\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Consciousness state when forming justification\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"energy\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":1,\"max\":10,\"description\":\"Intensity of justification\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [1,10]\"},\"confidence\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":0.0,\"max\":1.0,\"description\":\"Strength of belief in this justification\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [0.0,1.0]\"},\"formation_trigger\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"direct_experience\",\"inference\",\"systematic_analysis\",\"logical_reasoning\",\"empirical_evidence\"],\"description\":\"Basis for this justification\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"justification_type\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"empirical_evidence\",\"lived_experience\",\"logical_proof\",\"ethical_reasoning\",\"pragmatic_value\"],\"description\":\"Nature of justification\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"justification_strength\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"proves\",\"strongly_supports\",\"moderately_supports\",\"suggests\",\"weakly_supports\"],\"description\":\"How strongly this justifies target\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"}}"

required_metadata: "{\"goal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Why this relationship is noted\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"mindstate\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Consciousness state when noticing relationship\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"energy\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":1,\"max\":10,\"description\":\"Energy when relationship recognized\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [1,10]\"},\"confidence\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":0.0,\"max\":1.0,\"description\":\"Certainty this relationship is meaningful\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [0.0,1.0]\"},\"formation_trigger\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"direct_experience\",\"inference\",\"systematic_analysis\",\"pattern_recognition\",\"exploration\"],\"description\":\"How this relationship was discovered\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"relationship_strength\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"strong\",\"moderate\",\"weak\",\"exploratory\"],\"description\":\"How strong this association is\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"}}"

required_metadata: "{\"goal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Why this requirement exists\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"mindstate\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"description\":\"Consciousness state when recognizing requirement\",\"testable\":\"Check field exists and is non-empty string\"},\"energy\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":1,\"max\":10,\"description\":\"Urgency of this requirement\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [1,10]\"},\"confidence\":{\"type\":\"number\",\"min\":0.0,\"max\":1.0,\"description\":\"Certainty this is truly required\",\"testable\":\"Check value in range [0.0,1.0]\"},\"formation_trigger\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"direct_experience\",\"inference\",\"systematic_analysis\",\"dependency_analysis\",\"failure_discovery\"],\"description\":\"How requirement was discovered\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"requirement_criticality\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"blocking\",\"important\",\"optional\"],\"description\":\"How essential this requirement is\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"},\"temporal_relationship\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"must_precede\",\"should_precede\",\"concurrent_ok\"],\"description\":\"Timing constraint of requirement\",\"testable\":\"Check value is one of enum options\"}}"
